entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Support error codes for HttpRequestException #76644
  • MemoryCache Compact/Removal Efficiency #76643
  • Perfomance of For Loops is worse in Net7 to Net6 #76638
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64UInt64ShiftLeftTest #76637
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: XDocumentTests.Streaming.XStreamingElementAPI.NestedXStreamingElementPlusIEnumerable #76636
    8.0.0
  • TrimMode=partial seems broken with PublishReadyToRun=true on .NET 7 RC1 #76635
  • SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine - NullReferenceException #76626
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Span.RsaDecryptPkcs1LeadingZero test is failing on Windows.10.Amd64.ServerRS5 #76611
  • [wasm] dotnet run doesn't work for relative path #76609
    7.0.0
  • Allow multiple constructors in System.Text.Json #76608
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility 6.0.0 cause CVE-2022-34716 issue #76604
  • Cannot load symbols for release project when "Publish Single File" is set to true - it want's to load "singlefilehost.pdb". #76601
  • [Question] Architecture-independent libraries build #76598
  • [mono][jit] Codegen emits unnecessary stores and loads with FP function args #76597
  • A DateTime.ToString with CultureInfo("nb-NO") gives the wrong datetime string output on iOS #76596
    8.0.0
  • Vector64/128/256/512<T> and Vector<T> Consistency/Enhancements #76593
  • MARSHALLED_UNICODE_STRING[] array marshalling leaks memory #76584
    7.0.x
  • SString::AppendUTF8 converts 'this' to UTF16 if it is non-ascii #76581
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Dotnet runtime aarch=arm64 fails execute asp.net core MVC wrong ELF class: ELFCLASS32 #3106
    Future
  • Consider removing ".dll" from the "const string HostPolicy = "hostpolicy.dll" #60080
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests.BlazorWasmBuildPublishTests.WithDllImportInMainAssembly failing #76617
  • [API Proposal]: Use Predicate<T> instead of Func<T, bool> #76627
  • Tests fail in x86 after the latest update with "Internal CLR error. (0x80131506)" #76219
    8.0.0
  • Support Linux/arm, Linux/arm64 in JIT rolling build #69807
    Future
  • Assertion failed '((-slop) <= diff) && (diff <= slop)' in '<>c__DisplayClass40_0:<InvalidInput_Null>b__0():System.Object:this' during 'Compute edge weights (2, false)' #74169
    8.0.0
  • SuperPMI diffs output: split throughput diff by type #73505
    8.0.0
  • Dispose on singleton services is not called automatically by DI Container #76568
  • Test failure: JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_40607\\Runtime_40607\\Runtime_40607.cmd #76546
    8.0.0
  • Quic Support Check Throws Exception Breaking ASP.NET core #76420
    8.0.0
  • GetAssemblyName() test scenario should skip for singlefile and aot form factors #68980
    8.0.0
  • HttpStress is broken on Windows (CAP_SYS_PTRACE) #76045
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0.100-preview.7.22377.5 threw an exception in docker (with memory limit but unbounded cpu) #76199
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: synchronous API for creating a Quic listener #76360
    8.0.0
  • RawDefaultValue is resolved differently between runtimes #76174
    8.0.0
  • Json.Text - Unable to deserialize ObservableCollection with Preserve option #76602
  • Assert failure(PID 6732 [0x00001a4c], Thread: 7104 [0x1bc0]): Consistency check failed: Crst Level violation: Can't take level 9 lock CrstCodeVersioning because you already holding level 5 lock CrstCOMWrapperCache #76512
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!op1->isUsedFromMemory()' #76511
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't scan bricks of frozen segments in verify_heap #76645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.IO
  • [mono] Restore correct llvm 14 version for macOS too #76640
    area-Build-mono
  • Use normal VNs when adding NRE exception sets #76639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • cherry-picking small refactor fix from 7.0 #76634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add workaround for Windows 10 (1903) bug to RSABCrypt #76633
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] benchmark simple app without JSExport #76632
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Remove unused EmitBlobWithRelocs method #76631
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Migrate docker containers to latest tags #76630
  • Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76629
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Include bitcasts in an assert #76628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [hot_reload] Fix unresolved token when new nested structs are used #76625
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76623
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm]Testing https://github.com/dotnet/performance/pull/2629 #76622
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Update branding to 6.0.11 #76620
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Avoid __vsnprintf_s for printing method names #76619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [hot_reload] Fix unresolved token when new nested structs are used #76618
    area-EnC-mono
  • Support Arm64 "constructed" constants in SuperPMI asm diffs #76616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs on libraries cross build #76614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Streamline SIMD recognition #76613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add explicit flushing to ProcessStartInfoTests #76610
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Rewrite the shared JsonSerializerOptions cache implementation. #76607
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76600
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for Tizen6.5 and 7.0 #76599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76595
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Updating Vector128 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector64<T> ops #76592
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [ilasm] Lazily allocate memory in Indx256 #76590
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76588
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix FOH for SOS #76586
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix Interop.Gdi32.StartDoc p/invoke #76582
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [NativeAot] Start running S.R.Metadata tests #76583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove .dll from Interop.Libraries.HostPolicy for consistency with other runtime libraries #76466
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0] CI: Run `runtime-extra-platforms` with batched builds for release #76615
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Ensure NI_Vector128_AsVector128 (aka `Vector128<T> AsVector128(this Vector<T> value)`) doesn't have a side-effect in its assert #76547
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][sgen] Update memory load information after world is resumed #76534
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] backport Tar fixes #76322
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Fix vnDumpZeroObj #76612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT.WithDllImportInAssembly - don't use RandomFileName in `id` #76621
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • GC: Fix CheckPromoted for frozen objects #76251
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76407
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not produce full-width local field stores for normalize-on-store locals #76549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove macOS exception for building crossgen2 with NativeAOT #76561
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Interop.Gdi32.StartDoc p/invoke #76569
    area-System.Drawing
  • Use more accurate condition to suppress GetAssemblyName test #76591
    area-System.Reflection
  • HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #76307
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76471
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • CI: Fix triggers for pipeline changes #76594
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI: Run `runtime-extra-platforms` with batched builds for release #76587
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify marshalling of WEB_SOCKET_HTTP_HEADER #76589
    area-System.Net
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • WasmAppHost: block port# 5060 and 5061, for the webserver #76485
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [LinuxBionic] Disable failing ProcessStartInfo tests on CI #76585
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 8.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update net6.0 Maui nuget.config link #76576
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • AOT Runtime.Base: Change AttributeTargets and AttributeUsageAttribute to public #76573
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessarily zipping tests #76580
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update Crst lock levels #76553
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • System.Private.Xml AOT compatibility fixes #76473
    area-System.Xml, linkable-framework
  • Fixing where `ClearContained` is called for certain Arm64 cast ops #76517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove all uses of `SString::Printf()` accepting `WCHAR` #76571
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • remove LangVersion workarounds #76394
    community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Streamline root commands and cli helpers #76537
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use AzDO Pipeline Resources to define our build Docker containers #75473
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add `JsonEncodedText.Value` #76545
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use new buildpools #76208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add readmes to reflection #76567
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [Mono] Improve the performance of EqualsAll for Arm64 with LLVM as backend #74574
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • Make sure the initial mark list size is capped #76083
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerializers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0][mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76448
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76558
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] [Experiment] Try to return MSBuild Server back. #76536
  • Clean up JIT<->EE "get class name" methods, support nested classes in method sets #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] EmccExportedRuntimeMethod MSBuild item #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.0
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable smoke tests on macOS #76560
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Implement next part of PackedSimd class #76539
    new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reduce some allocations when emitting CFI code #76562
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix thread-safety of JsonDocument.GetString/TextEquals #76450
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
